metadata.summary: Configure adapter to ingest logs from AWS S3 buckets with parallel processing and prefix filtering
metadata.primary_use_case: Ingest log files stored in S3 buckets into LimaCharlie for security analysis

extracted_apis.description: Configure S3 adapter with bucket_name, access_key, secret_key, and optional prefix, parallel_fetch, single_load parameters

cross_refs.description: CloudTrail adapter uses S3 as one collection method
GuardDuty adapter uses S3 as one collection method
